name: office-addin-manifest-converter
description: A tool to convert Microsoft Office add-in manifests from XML format to JSON format.
author: Microsoft Corp.

scripts.prebuild: rimraf lib && tsc -p src/osf/tsconfig.json && concat-cli -f lib/osfmos.js src/osf/export.js -o lib/osfmos.js && concat-cli -f lib/osfmos.d.ts src/osf/export.d.ts -o lib/osfmos.d.ts
